titles.title: Human Chimera Prohibition Act of 2005
A bill to amend title 18, United States Code, to prohibit human chimeras.
Human Chimera Prohibition Act of 2005

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: Human Chimera Prohibition Act of 2005 - Amends the federal criminal code to prohibit and to set penalties for: (1) creating or attempting to create a human chimera (a being with human and non-human tissue as specified in this Act); (2) transferring or attempting to transfer a human embryo into a non-human womb, or a non-human embryo into a human womb; or (3) transporting or receiving a human chimera.
